ExtendableCookieChangeEvent.summary: The ExtendableCookieChangeEvent interface of the'Cookie Store API' is the event type passed to when any cookie changes occur. A cookie change event consists of a cookie and a type (either "changed" or "deleted".)

remarks.para: Cookie changes that cause the ExtendableCookieChangeEvent to be dispatched are:

blockquote.para: Note: A cookie that is replaced due to the insertion of another cookie with the same name, domain, and path, is ignored and does not trigger a change event.
